channel.title: PI wearing 3rd age robe bottum problem
channel.description:
Sup guys, Alright so when i try wearing 3rd age robe bottum, nothing happends. I looked in server run and got this.
[1/1/13 12:36 AM]: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -1 [1/1/13 12:36 AM]: at server.model.items.ItemAssistant.wearItem(ItemAssista nt.java:1231) [1/1/13 12:36 AM]: at server.model.players.packets.WearItem.processPacket(W earItem.java:36) [1/1/13 12:36 AM]: at server.model.players.PacketHandler.processPacket(Pack etHandler.java:138) [1/1/13 12:36 AM]: at server.model.players.Client.processQueuedPackets(Clie nt.java:1061) [1/1/13 12:36 AM]: at server.model.players.PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHand ler.java:140) [1/1/13 12:36 AM]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:158)

item.title: PI wearing 3rd age robe bottum problem
item.dc:creator: @dwarfs222 dwarfs222
item.description:
@dwarfs222 wrote:

3lv3n snip3r:

You have to add the item in either Item.java or ItemAssistant.java. Search for LEGS or something similar to that.

Simple fix

Read full topic
item.source: PI wearing 3rd age robe bottum problem
